website_summaries.verdict: While on the small side, this option offers a nice design and an automatic timer, so you won't have to remember to turn it on and off.
pros: This garden features an 850 lumen, 4000k LED light
Light is on a 16 hours on/8 hours off timer
Works well for herbs, vegetables, and flowers
light is the equivalent of a 14W bulb
cons: Does not come with either seeds/plants or pots
Some say the timer is a little erratic
Size limits plant size that can grow under it

customer_reviews.title: I need more room
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so easy to put together, works great The only thing is You should order the larger one your plants need room to grow, if you have the room. I bought herbs from the grocery store that you can take home and plant they are a little tall for the space but when you can cut and Busch them out your plants will work better I will order the next size when I save up my money it is worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small planters!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old niece loves this plant light and it works great! Her plants were in our kitchen window but we moved them to this light. They immediately sprouted and are growing great!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful indoor garden. Fits perfectly on a cart shelf next to my kitchen island. I'm a very happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected but pretty to look at
customer_reviews.text: Liked the size. It fit my ledge It was hard to get it to stsy together without hitting the pegs into slots lights didnt work Hard to get pots into the area without damaging the herbs
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA LUBLINER

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My green babies fit well in the clean, open space and look wonderful in the bright light. Easy on/off switch on the cord. The only thing I had trouble with, and I'm just barely deducting for it, is that I had to put some real pressure into snapping the pieces together. It's obviously supposed to be like that so that the garden doesn't fall apart, but I was worried I would break one of the walls before I finished. Otherwise, it's a beautiful finished product and I would recommend this if you need artificial light.
customer_reviews.author: BMC

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, cleverly designed, easy to assemble, works very well.  Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This is really a nice product! It's inexpensive and not very large but it works well for three plants as the product description shows. The LED light is very bright. The herbs we purchased are growing fast.
customer_reviews.author: Love my Springer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking, Assembly Required
customer_reviews.text: We really like this set, and it looks nice on the counter. Assembly took a little elbow grease- one of the slots wasn’t punched out completely, so we could get the tab to slide in. We had to shave it out with a knife. Not a catastrophe but noteworthy. We just planted our seeds, so we’ll have to wait and see how effective the light really is. The unit is a much lighter weight than I thought it would be but I don’t mind. We have high hopes!
customer_reviews.author: YouCantTunnelThroughSpace

customer_reviews.title: Split On The First Day
customer_reviews.text: I had gifted this to my wife. She had difficulties with the instructions for assembly and assembling the parts. The main structure split while assembling. The best part of this was the LED lightning, which is what you are paying for, the wood pieces would be better off purchasing from your local lumber/hardware store. So after a week, she tossed the structure, I kept the LED lighting and constructed a new Indoor Herb Garden.
customer_reviews.author: B. H. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: My plants are thriving inside this little miracle box. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Talbert

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Good choice for my small microgreen grows during the winter months. Nice landing at the top to sit other plants. It’s small but actually perfect for my needs. Nice sleek design and looks good from all angles. I appreciate the cord claps that came with it as they help hide the electrical cord. Works as expected. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works but some cosmetic design flaws
customer_reviews.text: It looks good w a quick glance and works, very simple. But a little care and thought in design could have been used to cover the joints for a much sleeker and nice product. To the manufacturer: Cover joints and hide the wires for a truly great design. Made of PVC.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: but cheaply made. I wish the light went all the way across. Only really good for 3 plants the way it is.
customer_reviews.author: rogwabbit

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was Skeptical about this product. It looks very flimsy but I wanted something small to fit on my kitchen prep table, and it worked out great! It’s pretty sturdy and my herbs grow Twice as fast under the light. These pics are only 3 weeks old from the day I started my herbs from seeds.. my herbs are bigger now and the difference is amazing. Without a light on then you can see my other herbs in ball jars trying to reach for the light. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: coreen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for countertop herbs
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Doesn’t take up much space and the automatic timer is fantastic. Wake up once to set it to what time you want it to turn on and as long as you leave it plugged in, it stays on for 16 hours then shuts off for exactly 8. Perfect for kitchen herbs.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: who have also expressed being pleased with their results
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my succulents, one of which was very sick when purchased. This light has helped keep it stable (along with a few other changes), and my other plants thriving. I've reccommended it to friends, who have also expressed being pleased with their results. Compact, easy to stack, and a great little home for your plants on any shelf or table!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Morehead

customer_reviews.title: The pictures don’t make it justice, this is very well designed!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t speak yet about it’s “grow” qualities but this is an extremely well built item. The pictures didn’t make it justice. I was expecting some thin, flimsy plastic and some LED strips but it’s not even close to that! Very easy to assemble, sturdy, well thought and designed. There are actual screws holding things in place and all the pieces fits snugly. Great item!
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo A

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gifts
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and sounds good but as it’s a Christmas gift, it hasn’t been put to use yet. Assuming the people I’m giving it to like it, I plan on buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Ilene

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for green thumbs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for starting seeds and keeping plants happy! I wish it had a timer on the light but otherwise its great for the value. Especially if you live in a small space
customer_reviews.author: Emmarose

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Works. Bought my 14yo plants and this light. In a few weeks visual growth to plants. I thunk this helped bring a little green thumb to her. Happy
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Helps Plants Grow Faster!
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing! My grandmother and I love to garden and this was perfect to have to start our plants that we started from seeds. We planted tomatoes, melons, lettuces, and some herbs from this. I only took a few days for each plant to start to sprout and grow strong while under the light.
customer_reviews.author: bearhuglover

customer_reviews.title: They love them paired with different seed collections
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my daughters. They love them paired with different seed collections, tea for one herbs for the other.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This will serve me nicely to grow my herbs indoors.
customer_reviews.text: A little flimsy in certain corners. Had to find a drain tray for the bottom runoff of water.
customer_reviews.author: Heinz M

customer_reviews.title: So far happy
customer_reviews.text: Went together quickly, easy to use. If the plants get too close to the bulbs they can burn but that was mentioned. My only issue is that the light has an internal timer switch which is supposed to be able to be either 16/8 or 12/12. Instructions on how to switch modes is clear but I have not yet be able to switch modes. Mostly because it takes 12 hours to confirm if I was successful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice counter top unit
customer_reviews.text: Nice growing unit for herbs in the winter. Easy to assemble. Slim design is perfect for my kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Great growing light
customer_reviews.text: I used this for growing herbs during the winter months. Planted the herbs from seeds and they are doing great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive herb grow garden works well.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with my purchase of this indoor herb garden looks awesome and I planted some Basil the other day nothing sprouted yet but I know it will soon..
customer_reviews.author: Margaret E Moll

customer_reviews.title: Great for seedlings in a small space
customer_reviews.text: Great little grow light. Perfect for small seedlings, plants on a table of dresser. If it came with a drip tray I would rate it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Perron

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: LOVE. We have plants sprouting . Good for herbs and starting out gardens indoors
customer_reviews.author: Becca Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! It is perfect for an apartment that doesn’t get a lot of light. I was able to start a little herb garden in our super dark basement apartment! I’m sure this would work perfect for starting and keeping other plants alive as well!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby S

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Quick easy setup. I’m growing various bonsai from seeds and they loving this. Although doesn’t fit on my window sill all that well.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Misocky

customer_reviews.title: Everything about it is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I love this countertop light! It was simple to put together, looks awesome, takes up less space than my breadbox, and my plants are thriving. I can’t stop looking at it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Meppiel

customer_reviews.title: ‘Twas a gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift! I hope they liked it and I worked well
customer_reviews.author: Israel M

customer_reviews.title: indoor herbs
customer_reviews.text: my son loves to cook & he loves this light. he is now growing fresh herbs in his kitchen
customer_reviews.author: simone m williams

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $
customer_reviews.text: Way over priced , not very durable ., very small . Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for Christmas and just had time to open and put together. And it does not work. The led light does not turn on. This is garbage. Do not buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sleepymode

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Looks great with my cactus I ordered from Fat Plants! Ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Janet K.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Xmas gift for my mom! She loved it. Such a great unique gift. Super easy to setup. Kudos!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: Simple and it works!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Simple installation and have plants within 10 days
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: The product was easy to build and made growing easy!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Grow lights
customer_reviews.text: Good product my apt doesn't get much light so this was perfect solution
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Junk dont buy!
customer_reviews.text: Junk! To small to grow even herbs . Wouldn't recommend to anyone. Bought it for .you wife but very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: patrick sears

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and great lighting for herbs
customer_reviews.text: This is very cleverly designed, and shipped flat. I've been running it daily now for a few months, and the product is standing the test of time very well. Can't wait to harvest my first crop of herbs soon!
customer_reviews.author: M. S. Manzke

product_meta.title: Mindful Design LED Indoor Herb Garden - at Home Mini Window Planter Kit for Herbs, Succulents, and Vegetables (White)
feature_bullets: GARDEN ANYWHERE - Love to garden but don't have the space? The Mindful Design LED Indoor Garden will bring your dream garden indoors. Perfect for offices, bedrooms, small apartments, or for when the weather outside is too harsh!
SUNLIGHT SIMULATING LED - The bright, 850 lumen, 4000k LED simulates natural sunlight, encouraging healthy plant growth.
AUTOMATIC SMART TIMER - LED light features automatic 16hr on, 8hr off mode so you never have to worry about turning the light on or off - the work is done for you.

GROW ANY TYPE OF PLANT - No special seed pods or extra equipment is required; grow any seed or plant you wish, as long as it fits! Ideal for growing everything from fresh herbs, to leafy greens, vegetables, or even flowers. The possibilities are endless!
PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS - Planter measures 16.5" L x 4.8" W x 11.4" H, seeds, plants and pots not included.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars118 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
